name: @mealplanner/monorepo
description: MealPlanner monorepo with front, agent, api (pnpm workspaces)

scripts.db:up: docker compose --project-name mealplanner-db --project-directory apps/db -f apps/db/docker-compose.yml up -d
scripts.db:down: docker compose --project-name mealplanner-db --project-directory apps/db -f apps/db/docker-compose.yml down
scripts.db:purge: docker compose --project-name mealplanner-db --project-directory apps/db -f apps/db/docker-compose.yml down -v
scripts.db:logs: docker compose --project-name mealplanner-db --project-directory apps/db -f apps/db/docker-compose.yml logs -f
scripts.db:ps: docker compose --project-name mealplanner-db --project-directory apps/db -f apps/db/docker-compose.yml ps
